title: The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a report parameter in the list box, the previously set default value is lost.
EB: The default value should be retained in the list box of the report parameter even after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Modify the default value.
3. Observe if the previously set default value is lost in the list box.
